description: All agents have the same level of activity (6). This uniformity might indicate a lack of specialization or potential misconfiguration in task distribution.
recommendation: Review the task allocation logic to ensure that each agent is performing tasks according to its specialization. Consider implementing dynamic task distribution based on current system needs.

description: API latency is significantly higher (69.70) compared to CPU and memory usage (both at 49.70). This discrepancy might indicate a bottleneck in network communication or inefficient API handling.
recommendation: Investigate the API handling processes to identify potential bottlenecks. Consider optimizing network configurations or reviewing API code for performance improvements.

description: Throughput is relatively high (119.70) compared to other performance metrics. While not necessarily negative, it could indicate an imbalance in resource allocation.
recommendation: Monitor the system to ensure that high throughput does not lead to resource exhaustion or affect other performance metrics. Adjust resource allocation if necessary.

description: Compliance status indicates performance and reliability are true, but given the performance anomalies, there might be underlying issues not captured by current compliance checks.
recommendation: Enhance compliance checks to include more detailed performance metrics and thresholds. Regularly review and update compliance criteria to reflect current system performance standards.
